items.name: case closeSubpath
items.desc: A line from the start point of the current subpath (if any) to the current point, which terminates the subpath.

items.name: case curve(to: CGPoint, control1: CGPoint, control2: CGPoint)
items.desc: A cubic Bézier curve from the previous current point to the given end-point, using the two control points to define the curve.

items.name: case line(to: CGPoint)
items.desc: A line from the previous current point to the given point, which becomes the new current point.

items.name: case move(to: CGPoint)
items.desc: A path element that terminates the current subpath (without closing it) and defines a new current point.

items.name: case quadCurve(to: CGPoint, control: CGPoint)
items.desc: A quadratic Bézier curve from the previous current point to the given end-point, using the single control point to define the curve.

items.name: static func == (Path.Element, Path.Element) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
